cleaned_text: Your Natural Path to Health Clinic Naturopath, BSc, ND 366 Passaic Ave, Nutley, NJ 07110 We offer in-person and virtual care with board certified and licensed naturopathic physicians practicing science-based natural medicine. Naturopathic doctors are trained in clinical nutrition, herbal medicine, homeopathy, Traditional Chinese Medicine, hydrotherapy, stress management, and lifestyle counseling. We offer personal, preventive, and participatory medicine; seeking the underlying cause of your symptoms. We use safe, natural, and non-invasive treatments to help you achieve health and prevent illness. Your Natural Path to Optimal Health and Wellbeing Begins Here! Naturopathy seeks to stimulate, enhance and support the individual's innate healing capacity in order to achieve optimal health. The goal of the naturopath is to discover the underlying cause of illness which is specific to the individual; rather than merely focusing on the patient's symptoms or disease. We practice personalized, participatory, and preventive medicine-seeking the underlying cause and using safe, natural methods to help you achieve optimal health and wellbeing.
